mechanics.mana_system: Energy cards attached to Pokemon. Basic Energy (Fire, Water, Grass, etc.) and Special Energy. Energy acceleration is key.
mechanics.color_system: Types: Fire, Water, Grass, Lightning, Psychic, Fighting, Darkness, Metal, Fairy, Dragon, Colorless
mechanics.special_rules: Prize cards (6 cards set aside, take when KO opponent's Pokemon). Going first: no supporter/attack. Going second: can attack. Regulation marks (D, E, F, etc.) determine legality.

terminology.Prize Cards: 6 cards set aside at start. Take one when KO opponent's Pokemon
terminology.Regulation Mark: Letter on card (D, E, F) determines format legality
terminology.Rule Box: Pokemon with special rules (V, VMAX, ex, GX)
terminology.Bench: Up to 5 Pokemon on bench (not active)

archetypes.name: Single-Prize Focused
archetypes.description: Deck built around Pokemon that give up one prize when KO'd
archetypes.strategy: Win through prize trade advantage - take 6 prizes while giving up fewer
archetypes.typical_curve: Low-medium - focus on setup and acceleration
archetypes.meta_position: Tier 1 - Gholdengo ex dominant (26% meta share)

archetypes.name: Control
archetypes.description: Deck that controls board and wins through resource advantage
archetypes.strategy: Disrupt opponent, accumulate resources, win with finisher
archetypes.typical_curve: Medium-high - focus on setup and control

formats.name: Standard
legal_sets: Sets with regulation marks F and G (2024-2025)
formats.rotation_schedule: Annual rotation - oldest regulation mark rotates
formats.meta_context: Gholdengo ex (26%), Dragapult ex (20%), Gardevoir ex (15%) are top decks. Single-prize strategies strong.

formats.name: Expanded
legal_sets: All sets from Black & White onwards
formats.meta_context: Powerful format with combo and control strategies

examples.reasoning: Both are Lightning-type V Pokemon. Pikachu VMAX evolves from Pikachu V, Raichu V is alternative evolution line.
Both are draw supporters. Iono disrupts opponent's hand, Professor's Research is pure draw. Similar function, different execution.

temporal_context.current_meta: Gholdengo ex (26%), Dragapult ex (20%), Gardevoir ex (15%) are top decks
temporal_context.price_volatility: New set releases cause price spikes. Journey Together cards (N's Zoroark ex) spiked recently
